original_text: He might find something that is dead. He must not eat it. He must not eat anything that an animal has torn. It will make him unclean. I am the Lord.
korean_text: 시체나 찢겨 죽은 짐승을 먹음으로 자기를 더럽히지 말라 나는 여호와이니라

sentences.original_text: He might find something that is dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 죽은 것을 발견할 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: He must not eat anything that an animal has torn
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 동물이 찢은 것을 먹어서는 안 된다
